mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM devops_ci_job dcj JOIN devops_cicd_pipeline dcp ON dcp.id = dcj.ci_pipeline_id JOIN devops_ci_api_test_info dcati ON dcati.id = dcj.config_id WHERE dcati.api_test_suite_id = #{suiteId}

select dcj.id as job_id,dcj.name as job_name, dcati.api_test_task_id as task_id, dcp.`name` AS pipeline_name from devops_ci_job dcj left join devops_ci_api_test_info dcati ON dcj.config_id = dcati.id LEFT JOIN devops_ci_stage dcs ON dcj.ci_stage_id = dcs.id LEFT JOIN devops_cicd_pipeline dcp ON dcs.ci_pipeline_id = dcp.id WHERE dcj.type = 'api_test' AND dcati.api_test_task_id in
#{taskId}
